Body.Content:
We are announcing the get increased accuracy in responses from Copilot feature for Power Automate. This feature enables Copilot to understand your intent more accurately, improving your productivity and ability to find answers quickly while building your flows. This feature will be released on December 31, 2024.

How does this affect me?
This feature provides improved accuracy for Copilot to understand your question and intent, as well as the benefits listed below:
  • Copilot has a deeper understanding of flow details and can suggest flow optimization and best practices.
  • Copilot supports adding scope and parallel branches to your flow.
  • You receive ChatGPT-parity chat experience in cloud flow Copilot, allowing for a real conversation with more proactive follow-ups.
  • You receive ChatGPT-parity quality on Q&A answers provided by Copilot.
What do I need to do to prepare?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

Title: Power Automate â€“ Get increased accuracy in responses from Copilot
